s = input().strip()

if s[0].isupper():
    print(s)
else:
    b = s[0].swapcase()
    print(b + s[1:])
def caps(s):
    first_bit = s[0].capitalize()
    
    return first_bit + s[1:]


def main():
    first_word = input()
    print(caps(first_word))
    
        
    
main()
